keywords.indexterm: Editing Documentschange the font size Accessibility

body.p: The font size of the editor panel can be changed with the following actions:

ul.li: Document Font size Increase editor font () - increases the font size with one point for each execution of the action.
Document Font size Decrease editor font () - decreases the font size with one point for each execution of the action.
Document Font size Normal editor font () - resets the font size to the value of the editor font set in Preferences.
